title: Roll-Removal/Authenticating Bug
body: This Afternoon at around 1:45 I tried to queue for a game of Draft pick. Every time I selected my roles, when I hit find match, it would remove them and make me start over again. After about 15 attempts I then proceeded to restart my Client where I am now stuck 'Authenticating' my login. If you have any solutions or possible answers please respond. Thank you!

replies.body: Hey, it looks like there are login issues around the Southeast that's impacting some players.  I don't have anymore info on this, but wanted to let you know what was going on.  Regarding the initial issue, it sounds like you might be having local network problems as well causing you to lose sync in champion select.  If the issue continues after that node is fixed up, you may want to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and test it in a custom game.

could be an AT&T issue.  I was able to log in when i switched to my comcast internet.  Discord was still working fine when i was on the AT&T internet though.  ONly seemed like league was having issues
I had the same problem.  What service provider do you have?
At&t, and only At&t, gonna restart the router cause other programs area having trouble connecting at the moment
